title: Very excited to be on season 2 of Reversed later this year!
transcript: hey guys dr chaffee here just letting you know i'm very excited to be a part of the second season of reverse by charles maddox where we take doctors and coaches and real live people and get them together to actually reverse their diseases get them on a carnivore diet improve their life improve their health get them off medication and reverse their diseases just like the name of the show sounds so that'll be filmed later on this year in costa rica and i'm really looking forward to it so keep an eye out for that and you'll get more updates as we go on and hopefully you'll be able to catch it when it comes out and see for yourself just how life changing this way of eating is all right guys see you later
